An order type where the user decides the quantity and price directly, used when prioritizing the desired price over execution certainty.
An order type where you only enter the order amount for buying or quantity for selling, and it executes immediately at the market price.\nSuitable for quick trades.

resources.string: \u2022 If there are many requests, the 1 KRW deposit may take more than 5 minutes.
\u2022 If there is no deposit record, please check your account information again.
Are you opening the account for your own use?
Please prepare your Resident Registration Card or\nDriver\'s License.
To open an account, you need to take a photo of your ID\nthat can verify your real name.
Identical or consecutive numbers, and numbers related\nto personal information are restricted.
For faster access,\nset up biometric authentication.
You can also set it up in the\nMore > Authentication/Security menu.
Uses biometric information registered on the device for identity verification\nduring STIP login and is not transmitted/stored on the server.

Now you can start investing
with STIP!

Digital Intellectual Property (DIP) trading is available.

STIP operates a 24/7 exchange
to support DIP trading anytime.

Now trade DIP freely without time and
place constraints!
Recently, there have been many cases of telecommunication financial fraud (voice phishing) using Digital IP (DIP) assets.
If any of the above applies, it could be a voice phishing scam.
If you have even the slightest suspicion, stop the transaction immediately and contact the STIP KakaoTalk channel.
Anyone can become a victim of voice phishing. You can prevent it with extra caution.
Did employees of domestic/international exchanges or financial institution representatives ask for financial information or induce Digital IP (DIP) deposits?
Did a foreigner you befriended on SNS, dating apps, etc., introduce an unfamiliar overseas trading site and induce you to sign up?
Did someone offer to compensate for investment losses and demand you join a specific site, install an app, or create a wallet?

"This address is exclusively for {currencyCode} deposits. Depositing other Digital IPs may result in errors or loss, which cannot be recovered.

 Furthermore, according to our suspicious transaction review process, submission of documents verifying the source of funds may be required, potentially delaying deposit reflection. Based on the document review results, the deposit may not be approved, and withdrawal fees may apply upon return.

 This address is for deposits only."
Please deposit to the designated account shown above.\nAfter the deposit is confirmed, it will be reflected in your account.
Proceeding with confirmation will complete the withdrawal request, and it cannot be canceled.
The withdrawal request is completed immediately upon confirmation and cannot be canceled afterwards.

Lending your STIP account under your name upon request or instruction from others may lead to legal penalties, and sharing a real-name verified account carries risks of personal information leakage. Additionally, withdrawal services may not be smooth during bank maintenance hours (daily 23:50~00:10), and using a VPN may result in withdrawal holds or restrictions. 

Withdrawals may also be blocked if suspected of fraudulent transactions. Furthermore, as part of our suspicious transaction review process, we may request documents to verify the source of funds and withdrawal destination upon withdrawal request, which may cause delays. 

Please note that based on the document review results, the withdrawal may not be approved.

Lending your STIP account under your name to others can lead to legal penalties, and sharing a real-name verified account risks personal information leakage.

Withdrawal services may not be smooth during bank maintenance hours (23:50~00:10).

Using a VPN may delay or restrict withdrawals, and withdrawals may be blocked if suspected of fraudulent transactions.

During the suspicious transaction review process, document submission may be required to verify the source of funds and withdrawal destination, potentially causing delays. Withdrawal may be rejected based on the review results.
Before withdrawing your membership, please ensure you complete any necessary actions if you hold IP assets.
Once withdrawal proceeds, all held IP assets and related data will be deleted and cannot be recovered.

Registered personal information will also be deleted upon withdrawal, although information required to be stored for a certain period according to relevant laws may be retained. Additionally, external services linked to the STIP IP Exchange account (e.g., third-party linked services) will be automatically terminated and become unusable.

After membership withdrawal, all information including IP assets and transaction history will be deleted, and consent for use of individual services within the STIP IP Exchange will also be withdrawn.
Please note that withdrawal is possible even if you hold IP assets.
• If real-name verified account information is not available, payment of service fees may be restricted.
• Re-joining the STIP IP Exchange is not possible for 24 hours after withdrawal.

• If you withdraw and rejoin more than twice within one year, joining may be restricted for one year. However, re-joining application may be possible if a valid reason is acknowledged through customer service.

This Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") includes provisions regulating the ordinary license for the use of Digital IP (hereinafter referred to as "this DIP").

 Article 1 (Purpose)
 The purpose of this Agreement is to clarify the rights and obligations of the owner of this IP (hereinafter referred to as the "Right Holder") and the investor intending to use it, thereby ensuring the lawful use of this IP.

 Article 2 (Definition of this IP)
 This IP refers to IP listed through the STIP IP Exchange, which may include patent rights, copyrights, trademark rights, design rights, music, dance, franchises, artworks, game codes, business models, and other intellectual property rights.

 Article 3 (Grant of Ordinary License)
 1. By listing this IP, the Right Holder grants the user the right to use this IP according to the ordinary license ratio set by the Right Holder.
 2. If the user holds Digital IP (DIP) satisfying the ordinary license ratio for the corresponding IP, the user may use this intellectual property within the defined scope.
 3. If a DIP holder requests the right to use this IP, the Right Holder must register the usage right with the relevant IP registration authority within 2 weeks from the application date.
 4. The user may use this IP only for the purposes defined in the ordinary license and may not assign, lend, or sublicense this license to others without the prior written consent of the Right Holder. In case of violation, the Right Holder may immediately terminate the user's usage right, claim damages, and impose relevant legal sanctions.
 5. Investors and buyers intending to use this IP can legally exercise the ordinary license only after the Right Holder has registered the IP with the competent authority. During the period of using the IP, the corresponding DIP cannot be sold. If the user no longer uses the IP, they must notify the owner, cancel the ordinary license right, and wait 4 weeks before the DIP can be sold.

 Article 4 (Method of IP Usage)
 1. The method for using this IP is to purchase the DIP specified for each IP on the STIP IP Exchange.
 2. The user shall bear all legal, tax, fee, and other costs associated with the use of the license. However, investors and buyers purchasing this IP for use cannot sell the corresponding DIP during the period they are using the IP after the Right Holder has registered it. If they no longer use the IP, they must notify the owner, cancel the ordinary license right, and wait 4 weeks before selling the DIP. Registration costs related to the application for ordinary license use shall be borne by the IP owner.

 Article 5 (User's Obligations and Restrictions)
 1. The user may not use this IP for illegal purposes or in a manner that infringes upon the rights of third parties.
 2. When utilizing this IP, credit for the content must be clearly indicated.
 3. The user may modify, adapt, or reprocess this IP for use.

 Article 6 (Right Holder's Obligations and Warranties)
 1. The Right Holder warrants that this IP does not infringe upon the rights of third parties.
 2. In the event of a legal dispute regarding this IP, the Right Holder shall cooperate with the user for a swift resolution. All responsibility shall be borne and resolved by the IP owner.

 Article 7 (Termination and Suspension of Agreement)
 1. If the user violates the terms of this Agreement, the Right Holder may terminate this license immediately after notification.
 2. Even after the termination or expiration of this Agreement, Articles 3, 5, and 8 shall remain in effect.

 Article 8 (Dispute Resolution)
 1. All disputes arising in connection with this Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea, and the Seoul Central District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
In the event of a dispute, the parties shall make their best efforts to resolve it through mutual consultation.

 Article 9 (Miscellaneous Provisions)
 Matters not specified in this Agreement shall be governed by the relevant laws and commercial practices of the Republic of Korea.
